modShortDescription: This mod modifies all Magazines & Schematics to give a quest called Skill Point Reward, that auto-completes to give the player a skill point.
modDescription:
This mod modifies all **Magazines & Schematics** to give a quest called **Skill Point Reward**, that auto-completes to give the player a [skill point](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-skill-points/). The idea is that if you gain knowledge through reading, you should also gain a skill point. “Read” a magazine to gain a skill point. “Use” a magazine to learn it.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-Magazine_Plants_Trader/tree/master/Magazine_Schematics_Skillpoint)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17433-magazine-skillpoints-e-to-pickup-plants-1day-trader-refresh/).

**Credits:** [ShoudenKalferas](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/shoudenkalferas/)
